data.text: Saa anisoadehu a ɛfa Yuda ne Yerusalem ho no baa Amos babarima Yesaia so wɔ Yuda ahemfo Usia, Yotam, Ahas ne Hesekia mmere so.
Ɔsoro, muntie! Asase, yɛ aso!
Nantwi nim ne wura,
Nnome nka, amumɔyɛ man,
Adɛn nti na mopɛ sɛ wɔkɔ so boro mo?
Efi mo nan ase kosi mo ti so,
Mo man ada mpan,
Wɔagyaw Ɔbabea Sion
Sɛ Asafo Awurade
Muntie Awurade asɛm,
“Mo afɔrebɔ ahorow bebree no,
Sɛ moba mʼanim a
Munnyae afɔrebɔde a ɛmfra a mode ba no!
Mo ɔsram foforo afahyɛ ne mo aponto a moahyehyɛ,
Sɛ momema mo nsa so bɔ mpae a,
“Munnwira mo ho na mo ho ntew.
Monyɛ papa! Monhwehwɛ atɛntrenee.
“Afei mommra na yennwen mmɔ mu,”
Sɛ mopene so na moyɛ osetie a,
Na sɛ moampene na motew atua a,
Hwɛ sɛnea kuropɔn nokwafo no
Wo dwetɛ adan ade a so nni mfaso,
Wo sodifo yɛ atuatewfo,
Enti, Awurade, Asafo Awurade,
Mɛma me nsa so, atia mo;
Mɛma mo atemmufo bio sɛ kan no,
Wɔde atɛntrenee begye Sion bio,
Nanso atuatewfo ne nnebɔneyɛfo de, wɔbɛdwerɛw wɔn abɔ mu,
“Mo ani bewu, esiane odum anyame a
Mobɛyɛ sɛ odum a ne nhaban apo,
Ɔhoɔdenfo bɛyɛ sɛ ade a ɛhyew ntɛm
